Html:
Hello radioman,

I have maybe ten markers wich are circles with a radius of 600m, after adding I want to zoom in this area. With ZoomAndCenter works fine for the "center" of the marker, but the 600m circles aren't shown(often they are outside of the mapbounds). Do you have a idea how to watch the the markerssize for calculation in this function?
public RectLatLng? GetRectOfAllMarkers(string overlayId)
Thanks for this great piece of work!
Bye robbeEDE
